effect.name: Zoom with Crop and Align
effect.description: Zoom in and out cropping it and align to a position when you need it close to an edge.
effect.author: Sphax - Flavien Clermont, Crop & Align added by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: X Alignment
parameter.description: 0 for Left, 1 for Right, 0.5 for Center.

parameter.name: Y Alignment
parameter.description: 0 for Top, 1 for Bottom, 0.5 for Center.
